metadata.title: Colosseum Solana Startups Directory
metadata.description: Comprehensive directory of Solana startups from Colosseum hackathons and accelerator cohorts (2024-2026). Focused on early-stage/growing startups.
metadata.source: Colosseum Blog, Arena submissions, GitHub, X/Twitter profiles
notes: Program IDs marked 'TBD' = project not yet deployed to mainnet or ID not publicly listed
GitHub URLs marked 'private' = code is closed-source or invite-only
Contributors are approximated from GitHub activity and team size where available
active_2025 flag based on X/Twitter activity, commits, and product launches through Feb 2026

startups.name: Ore
startups.description: A cryptocurrency everyone can mine using a novel proof-of-work algorithm on Solana. V2 introduced DrillX algorithm and staking. Fixed supply of 21M tokens.
startups.notable: Grand Champion Renaissance Hackathon. One of the most viral Solana projects of 2024. Makes ~5% of each Solana block.

startups.name: Urani
startups.description: Intent-based swap aggregator bringing protection against toxic MEV at the application layer.

startups.name: DBunker
startups.description: An open network for DePIN financial derivatives and supply-side aggregation.

startups.name: DeCharge
startups.description: An EV charging network integrated with Solana, offering globally compatible hardware for affordable access.

startups.name: Torque
startups.description: A protocol for builders and dApps to deploy user acquisition strategies natively onchain.

startups.name: BlockMesh
startups.description: A Solana-based DePIN project for decentralized network infrastructure.

startups.name: GreenKWh
startups.description: An off-grid DePIN network for promoting decentralized renewable energy while load balancing the grid during peak usage.

startups.name: AlphaFC
startups.description: Gives football fans real stake in their favorite clubs through tokens for participating in key decisions like scouting, trades, and team management.

startups.name: Darklake
startups.description: Bringing Wall Street efficiency to DeFi with lightning-fast, private, and MEV-resistant trades leveraging privacy-preserving execution powered by ZKPs.

startups.name: Supersize
startups.description: An io-style game enabling players to experience real-time, fully on-chain, high stakes multiplayer gaming.

startups.name: Tokamai
startups.description: Catches development errors before your users do through real-time monitoring and alerting for Solana programs.

startups.name: Txtx
startups.description: Takes away the stress and complexity of onchain infrastructure management with secure, robust, and reproducible blocks of code called Runbooks.

startups.name: The Arena
startups.description: A fast-paced PVP trading game that leverages decentralized exchanges and novel socialfi mechanics.

startups.name: Reflect Protocol
startups.description: A DeFi protocol that powers a novel hedge-backed, delta-neutral stablecoin on Solana.
startups.notable: Also a sponsor of the Cypherpunk Hackathon

startups.name: Hylo
startups.description: A yield-bearing DeFi protocol that enables an autonomous, dual-token stablecoin system backed by Solana LSTs.

startups.name: Trenches.top
startups.description: A platform to tokenize the reputation of alpha callers on Solana, unlocking new forms of competition and social speculation.

startups.name: AdX
startups.description: A next generation decentralized ad exchange and network, built to enable realtime encrypted blind auction bidding to serve targeted digital ads.

startups.name: Watt Protocol
startups.description: A volatility farming protocol that uses natural market arbitrage to generate real yield for users and foster liquidity.

startups.name: Pregame
startups.description: A p2p sports wagering app that lets users bet against anyone online in a trustless manner.

startups.name: TapeDrive
startups.description: Decentralized object storage native to Solana. 1,400x cheaper than on-chain accounts. Uses compressed proofs and a miner network secured by TAPE token incentives.
startups.program_id: TBD - devnet deployed, mainnet pending audit
startups.notable: Grand Champion Breakout Hackathon ($50K). Active miner network. Crate published on crates.io

startups.name: CargoBill
startups.description: A stablecoin payments platform for enabling fast, low-cost payments for supply chain operations.

startups.name: Crypto Fantasy League (CFL)
startups.description: Fantasy sports for crypto tokens where you draft token squads and compete in PvP based on real market movements. Built for Solana Mobile.

startups.name: Decal
startups.description: A platform that enables merchants to accept crypto payments and brands to create token-based digital loyalty programs.
startups.notable: Listed in Solana Mobile App Store

startups.name: LocalPay
startups.description: Enables millions of existing stablecoin holders and digital nomads to use their assets for day-to-day payments in emerging markets.

startups.name: MetEngine
startups.description: A comprehensive platform to simplify and automate liquidity provision in DeFi.

startups.name: Slant
startups.description: An AI data scientist for Solana, building research-grade analytics tools to support developers, investors, and researchers.

startups.name: Tempo
startups.description: An automated trading bot management platform engineered for Solana, offering ultra-fast execution and zero-slot transaction landing.

startups.name: Trepa
startups.description: An app that provides advanced prediction market users the ability to bet more precisely on market outcomes.

startups.name: TypeX
startups.description: Turns your keyboard into a powerful onchain gateway with a built-in non-custodial wallet, plus gaming and DeFi integrations.

startups.name: MCPay
startups.description: Open payment infrastructure providing Model Context Protocol tools, data sources, and specialized agent capabilities using x402.
startups.notable: 1st Place Stablecoins Track. Bridges AI agents with crypto payments.

startups.name: Synthesis
startups.description: A high-performance prediction market aggregation trading platform.

startups.name: Unruggable
startups.description: A next generation hardware wallet and companion app built exclusively for Solana.
startups.notable: Grand Champion Cypherpunk Hackathon ($30K). Also won 3rd in Breakout Infra Track.

startups.name: Rekt
startups.description: A mobile app that gives everyday users access to better buying power through simple, gamified crypto trading.

startups.name: Cloak
startups.description: Building a privacy layer for the crypto ecosystem using a ZKP system that runs at the speed of Solana.

startups.name: Credible
startups.description: A stablecoin-powered remittance platform built for banks, fintechs, and businesses sending money in/out of India.

startups.name: Yumi Finance
startups.description: A fully onchain 'buy now, pay later' solution that handles underwriting, financing, loan origination and servicing of bad debt.

startups.name: Superfan
startups.description: A meta-record label enabling rising and established artists to have a much more direct financial relationship with their fans globally.

startups.name: Kormos
startups.description: A new DeFi platform that brings higher yields without leverage to Solana utilizing a fractional reserves primitive.

startups.name: Capitola
startups.description: A prediction markets meta-aggregator that enables users to trade all events at the best price.

startups.name: Archer
startups.description: A new batch auction exchange primitive utilizing dual flow batch auctions for the most competitive prices for traders.

hackathon_winners_not_in_accelerator.description: Prize-winning projects from Breakout and Cypherpunk hackathons that were NOT selected for the accelerator but are notable startups.

projects.name: Vanish
projects.description: An on-chain privacy solution for Solana using zero-knowledge proofs.

projects.name: FluxRPC
projects.description: The first RPC on Solana that fully separates from the validator layer. Pay-per-bandwidth pricing ($0.06/GB).

projects.name: Latinum
projects.description: A payment middleware that enables MCP builders to get paid for AI agent services.

projects.name: Decen Space
projects.description: A platform that makes satellite communication cheaper and easier using decentralized infrastructure.

projects.name: LootGo
projects.description: A mobile-first project integrating with Solana Mobile for the Seeker dApp store.

projects.name: IDL Space
projects.description: An open-source tool that benefits developers across the Solana ecosystem for working with program IDLs.

projects.name: OpenSOL
projects.description: University-led open source project for Solana development.

projects.name: Vertigo
projects.description: A sniper-proof DEX for token launches on Solana, preventing front-running and bot exploitation.

projects.name: Encifher
projects.description: A platform that adds encrypted privacy to DeFi operations on Solana.

projects.name: Melee Markets
projects.description: A viral market platform blending speculation with prediction markets.

projects.name: Glympse
projects.description: A fantasy sports app for Web2 attention, gamifying social media engagement.

projects.name: Deks
projects.description: A platform that simplifies crypto onboarding through digital and physical gift cards.

projects.name: Clipstake
projects.description: A launchpad for content creators to raise funds by tokenizing future ad revenue.

projects.name: Aquanode
projects.description: A cloud compute platform aggregating decentralized providers and featuring orchestration services.

projects.name: Project Plutus
projects.description: An app to deploy any AI agent on Solana with full on-chain integration.

projects.name: Agent Arc
projects.description: A non-custodial AI trading terminal for automated crypto trading strategies.

projects.name: Crush
projects.description: An app that turns everyday receipts into liquid micro-assets using DePIN infrastructure.

projects.name: Seer
projects.description: A transaction debugging developer platform for Solana programs.

projects.name: Autonom
projects.description: A specialized oracle for Real World Assets (RWAs) on Solana.

projects.name: attn.markets
projects.description: A protocol for tokenizing revenues to bank onchain businesses.

projects.name: Bore.fi
projects.description: Tokenized SME private equity protocol bringing small business investment on-chain.

projects.name: Pencil Finance
projects.description: A protocol bringing student loans on-chain for transparent and accessible education financing.

projects.name: Watchtower
projects.description: Onchain asset-backed financing for space infrastructure projects.

projects.name: Mercantill
projects.description: Enterprise banking infrastructure for AI agents, enabling autonomous financial operations.

projects.name: Sp3nd
projects.description: Platform enabling stablecoin payments for Amazon products, bridging crypto with mainstream e-commerce.

projects.name: Fora
projects.description: A group chat based trading platform and prediction market protocol.

projects.name: Corbits
projects.description: An open-source x402 endpoint dashboard for merchants to accept crypto payments.

projects.name: Ionic
projects.description: A data aggregation layer for Solana, indexing and serving on-chain data efficiently.

projects.name: Pine Analytics
projects.description: Data analytics infrastructure and querying platform for Solana on-chain data.

projects.name: Echo
projects.description: A network for scientists to get matched with funders to better understand scientific research claims.

projects.name: Solana ATM
projects.description: A physical machine with a p2p cash/stablecoin liquidity pool for offline crypto access.

projects.name: Humanship ID
projects.description: A privacy-first human identity layer on Solana for sybil resistance and proof of personhood.

projects.name: Samui Wallet
projects.description: An open-source wallet project benefiting developers across the Solana ecosystem.

projects.name: Pythia
projects.description: AI-powered research and analysis tool, winner of the University Award.

projects.name: Hobba
projects.description: A payments platform leveraging self-repaying loans for seamless transactions.

projects.name: Legasi
projects.description: A compliant credit layer using Lombard loans for on-chain lending against real assets.

projects.name: Nomu
projects.description: A marketplace where you can buy products and get rewarded for being early.

projects.name: Scrim
projects.description: A skill-based wagering platform for competitive gamers.

projects.name: Block Stranding
projects.description: The world's first survival OMRPG (Onchain Multiplayer RPG) on Solana.

projects.name: Lazor Kit
projects.description: Passkey-based authentication toolkit for Solana dApps. Mentioned in Colosseum Codex.

projects.name: CONYR
projects.description: A real-time intelligence engine for Solana with AI-powered insights and analytics.

projects.name: Home Harvest
projects.description: The world's largest ReFi community of connected growers using DePIN for sustainable agriculture.

projects.name: NovenGrid
projects.description: DePIN for renewable power generation and storage nodes, creating a decentralized energy grid.
